name: Ket
description:
You play as an adventurer inside a dungeon trying to find the treasure to bring to your partner.  Search for blood syringes or sacrifice your own to open the locks to the treasure. Bats move 1 grid, while you can move 2 and can sacrifice to gain more moves, you can heal with the syringes.

Controls:

- W A S D /  KEYS  movement

- E sacrifice ( - 1 health  , + 1 move )

- Q heal (  - 1 syringe  , + 1 health )

- SPACE skip turn ( - bats turn to move,  + 2 moves)
